positions.subtitle: Delta-V Analytics
positions.description: ● Engineered mission-based satellite simulating digital twins with member and stakeholder based simulating workspace, revolutionizing simulation capabilities.● Spearheaded R&D on establishing bidirectional communication socket channels and simulation mechanisms, advancing communication capabilities.● Led and managed the AWS cloud infrastructure using infrastructure as code, ensuring scalable and reliable cloud operations.● Built a robust authentication unit with enhanced security measures such as firewalls, API access keys, authorizers, and mechanisms for multi-session and idle session management ensuring seamless user experiences.● Designed and managed a comprehensive microservice-based API architecture, integrating API gateways, Lambdas, and serverless deployment pipelines, significantly improving deployment efficiency and system scalability.● Integrated deployment pipelines for AWS Fargate architecture, leveraging AWS ECS, ECR, Load Balancer, Networking Infrastructure, CodePipelines, and CodeBuild, ensuring a robust and efficient deployment process.● Orchestrated smooth frontend deployment pipelines using AWS S3, Route 53, and CloudFront for rapid application deployment.● Build History for tracking simulation events, eliminating manual satellite build track by 100% and optimizing historical data storage of simulating configurations and visualizations.● Designed user-session based Kubernetes pod management in typescript cloud-functions enhancing user-service management efficiency by 60%.● Developed a suite of service wrappers (Drag and Drop, Multithread, Layout, JSON Forms, Visualization Engines) enhancing project functionality and efficiency by 40%, enabling advanced features like timeseries analysis satellite diagram modelling and 3D Cesium simulting visualization.
positions.title: Software Development Engineer(AI and DevOps)
positions.description_html:
● Engineered mission-based satellite simulating digital twins with member and stakeholder based simulating workspace, revolutionizing simulation capabilities.
● Spearheaded R&D on establishing bidirectional communication socket channels and simulation mechanisms, advancing communication capabilities.
● Led and managed the AWS cloud infrastructure using infrastructure as code, ensuring scalable and reliable cloud operations.
● Built a robust authentication unit with enhanced security measures such as firewalls, API access keys, authorizers, and mechanisms for multi-session and idle session management ensuring seamless user experiences.
● Designed and managed a comprehensive microservice-based API architecture, integrating API gateways, Lambdas, and serverless deployment pipelines, significantly improving deployment efficiency and system scalability.
● Integrated deployment pipelines for AWS Fargate architecture, leveraging AWS ECS, ECR, Load Balancer, Networking Infrastructure, CodePipelines, and CodeBuild, ensuring a robust and efficient deployment process.
● Orchestrated smooth frontend deployment pipelines using AWS S3, Route 53, and CloudFront for rapid application deployment.
● Build History for tracking simulation events, eliminating manual satellite build track by 100% and optimizing historical data storage of simulating configurations and visualizations.
● Designed user-session based Kubernetes pod management in typescript cloud-functions enhancing user-service management efficiency by 60%.
● Developed a suite of service wrappers (Drag and Drop, Multithread, Layout, JSON Forms, Visualization Engines) enhancing project functionality and efficiency by 40%, enabling advanced features like timeseries analysis satellite diagram modelling and 3D Cesium simulting visualization.

positions.subtitle: Delta-V Analytics
positions.description: ● Lead Project Nembus, a 3D view of mega-constellations coverage by scraped geo-orbital data with multi-workspace reports, reducing 45% data rental cost and ensuring the project met its critical data management requirements.● Built FaultDetection reducing downtime by 20% by training user data with channel mapping automated by cloning & parser. Predicting anomaly reports from user-trained LSTM model in react flask architecture. with diagnostic summarizations for both components and its channels.● Built SystemIdentification enhancing dynamic metric by 30%. by flask’s distributed architecture, with dual-stage workspace & storage cleanups.● Increased user experience and loading downtime by 30% by handling simulation streams in czml and 3D visualization of current simulations.● Reduced api-response time by 12% by migrating rest-api to GRPC Web protobuf with envoy proxy and docker for http1-http2 communication.● Reduced network usage & latency by 60% by real-time data streams using distributed service of NodeJS and Websocket with Redis cashing.
positions.title: Software Developer (FullStack)
positions.description_html:
● Lead Project Nembus, a 3D view of mega-constellations coverage by scraped geo-orbital data with multi-workspace reports, reducing 45% data rental cost and ensuring the project met its critical data management requirements.
● Built FaultDetection reducing downtime by 20% by training user data with channel mapping automated by cloning & parser. Predicting anomaly reports from user-trained LSTM model in react flask architecture. with diagnostic summarizations for both components and its channels.
● Built SystemIdentification enhancing dynamic metric by 30%. by flask’s distributed architecture, with dual-stage workspace & storage cleanups.
● Increased user experience and loading downtime by 30% by handling simulation streams in czml and 3D visualization of current simulations.
● Reduced api-response time by 12% by migrating rest-api to GRPC Web protobuf with envoy proxy and docker for http1-http2 communication.
● Reduced network usage & latency by 60% by real-time data streams using distributed service of NodeJS and Websocket with Redis cashing.

positions.subtitle: Delta-V Analytics
positions.description: ● Engineered GUI based 3D satellite component visualization designed by graph based component categorization, to their parent propagators.● Designed simulation interface in Konva Minimap & zoom controls enhancing accessibility by 10%. with canvas event computations in browser worker-threads and Redux● Designed intricate data flows to increase efficiency by 20% with Redux and sagas, custom hooks, with an adapter architecture, streamlining data handling processes.● Utilized advanced frontend storage services like IndexDB, local, and session storage to ensure robust data management and accessibility.● Maintained and managed code by employing highest software development standards ESLint, Prettier, Webpack and Pre-committer Husky, resulting in a reliable and maintainable codebase.● Programmed functionalities include sharing & custom linking simulations.
positions.title: Software Developer (Frontend)
positions.description_html:

● Designed intricate data flows to increase efficiency by 20% with Redux and sagas, custom hooks, with an adapter architecture, streamlining data handling processes.

● Programmed functionalities include sharing & custom linking simulations.

recommendations: Mayank Gupta “I enjoyed working closely with Nirmalya during his tenure at Namasys. He is a skilled Full Stack Engineer with expertise in a broad range of technologies including Node.js, React.js, Redux, and Express.js. Nirmalya has a strong understanding of database development, cloud computing, and DevOps practices. What impressed me the most was Nirmalya's ability to seamlessly integrate both frontend and backend development, creating efficient REST APIs and scalable solutions.”

Divya Joshi “Nirmalya is one of the most delightful person I had the pleasure of managing for in my career, whom I believe is a great asset for any organisation. During his tenure in GFG he was an good performer and has constantly exceeded expectations with his utmost dedication and hard work, and I wish him luck in all his future endeavours. ”

publications: [{"title":"Mastering AWS Deployment: A Step-by-Step Guide to VPCs, ECS, Load Balancers, ECR and CI/CD Pipelines","subtitle":"Medium","date":"June 1, 2024","description":"Mastering AWS Deployment: A Step-by-Step Guide to VPCs, ECS, Load Balancers, ECR, and CI/CD PipelinesDive deep into AWS deployment strategies with a comprehensive guide covering Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs), Elastic Container Service (ECS), Load Balancers, Elastic Container Registry (ECR), and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) Pipelines. Learn how to orchestrate these AWS services to build scalable and secure cloud architectures.Let's empower your AWS deployment journey for scalable and reliable applications."},{"title":"How to Deploy React App on AWS using S3, CloudFront, Route53 with AWS CI/CD CodePipeline & CodeBuild","subtitle":"Medium","date":"March 10, 2024","description":"Mastering AWS React Deployment:Explore the intricacies of AWS services to establish a resilient deployment pipeline using AWS CodePipeline and CodeBuild. Learn how to host a ReactJS website efficiently with AWS S3 for build storage, front-ended by CloudFront CDN. This publication also delves into attaching domains to CloudFront URLs using AWS Route53, ensuring seamless integration and enhanced performance.Let's harness technology to make a lasting impact and accessibility."}]
projects: [{"title":"ESTATE BAZAR","start_date":"Jan 2023","end_date":"Mar 2023","description":"Developed a secured AI-powered Real Estate marketplace for conducting smooth real estate auctions, leveraging Flask with PostgreSQL framework incorporating Artificial Neural Network, Web Sockets, BlockChain Network, Web Scrapping, Docker and JavaScript-based frontend.● Auction Managers Scrapes on-sale hosted properties from realtor.com and manages auction lifecycle.● Enabled real-time bidding with AI-driven property valuation predictions for bidders.● Implemented tokenized authentication using sha256 encryption, secured Ethereum Payments, and generated NFT tokens for sold items.● Containerized the entire tech stack in a Docker environment for scalable deployment.Link: https://hub.docker.com/r/nirmalyasaha/estate-bazar"},{},{},{},{"title":"Smart Auction","start_date":"Feb 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"FullStack Ethereum Blockchain prototype for secure and real-time auctions, integrating Solidity, IPFS-network, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Socket.io.● Engineered a prototype enabling real-time auction hosting secured with Ethereum Payments and generating NFT tokens for sold items.● Established a staging area using Node.js and MongoDB for nominated items, facilitating real-time bidding through Socket.io.Recognized as a finalist in the Hack-a-Web hackathon."},{},{},{"title":"Patti-Patni","start_date":"Jan 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"Developed a web-based Ethereum Blockchain application aimed at eliminating Marriage & Childbirth frauds, utilizing Solidity, IPFS-network, React.js, and Node.js.● Implemented a fraud reduction system for marriages, issuing unique certificate tokens upon government approval.● Built a public forum to track child birth, marital and parental status, particularly beneficial in handling divorce cases."},{"title":"Fund Raiser","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Developed a FundRaiser on Ethereum Blockchain, utilizing Solidity, IPFS-network, Mocha, Node.js, React.js, and Next.js. The platform aims to raise funds securely for Project Ideas, NGOs, and Personal Scholarships while mitigating fraud through blockchain technology.Security & Fraud Management:● Owners initiate fund generation requests to Managers, providing documentary proofs stored securely on IPFS-network.● Managers verify details and approve fund-raising requests, ensuring transparency and security.● All investor transactions are immutably recorded on Blockchain, fostering trust and accountability.● Owners request fund utilization transactions, subject to majority investor approval, giving investors control over fund usage.● Investors can raise issues through customer care and upvote others' issues. Managers trigger alerts based on upvoting, enhancing fraud prevention.People's Choice: Investors vote for the best project, where the winner receives a prize funded by earlier security deposits, promoting transparency and trust.Additional Features:● Fundraising options include Project Ideas, NGOs, and Personal Scholarships.● Personal Funds allow owners to withdraw without investor approval but exclude voting and customer care mechanisms.The decentralized and tamper-proof nature of blockchain ensures transparency and trust in investor interactions and voting mechanisms."},{"title":"College Street App (End-To-End Encryption & Machine Learning)","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Nov 2021","description":"A B2B marketplace for second hand books, using Kotlin, XML, Firebase & SQLite Database, Cryptography-AES, Firebase ML Kit● Buying & Selling of books with End-To-End Encrypted messaging support by Cryptography-AES technology● Interactive ChatBots, Search Engines with ImageToText recognition & custom filters. Media for Book Reviews with like, share, comment● Supportive Features of Product Reviews, WishList by SQLite, CartList, Settings, InApp Cals, Address & User Activity managements● Google Maps Api for tracking packages & QR Code confirmation. Implemented secure Encryption in User Contacts & Address."},{"title":"Connector","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"Aug 2021","description":"Social Media for developers/HR’s to share github commit stories, blogs post, apply/post jobs to hire developers, using MERN-stack, Socket.io, JWT-token● CRUD operations to Post stories(with like, unlike, comments), blogs, profile sections jobs and applying through submitting resume● Like and unlike posts, blogs. Comments like and unlike comments● Personalized dashboard to create, update & delete profile, experience, education, projects, awards & achievements, portfolio links, activity showing your posts and jobs posted.● Resume builder - create, share resumes with real time edit access by providing unique access codes using Socket.io and Quill Api● Private Messaging | One-To-One Video Conference interviews using WEBrtc Api | ChatBots using React ChatBot Kit● Online code editor for HTML,CSS,JAVASCRIPT using Codemirror Api | Advance Alert System | Validation Checks | Encryptions | Private Routes"},{"title":"Food Runner App","start_date":"Feb 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"● impact : Zomato clone food ordering app make your first order with this with a list of 10 restaurants and their menu chart.● using : Volley api calling, glide library, Intents(explicit and implicit), json and Gson parsing, Coroutines, SQLITE database,Room library, Live data,View Models.● firebase and Firestone.● using : kotlin and XML ."},{"title":"Notes App","start_date":"Feb 2021","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"● impact: storing various notes and images and share it by Live data .● creating a SQLITE database using Room library to store , delete and share notes in a View Model using Live data● tech: Intents explicit and implicit, SQLite Room database, android architecture, View Model, Coroutines,Live data .● using kotlin and XML."}]
